content.query:
SELECT
     TOP 100 *
 FROM
     OPENROWSET(
         BULK 'https://datalakebq5d8yi.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales/json/**',
         FORMAT = 'CSV',
         FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
         FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
         ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
     ) WITH (Doc NVARCHAR(MAX)) as rows


---------
 SELECT JSON_VALUE(Doc, '$.SalesOrderNumber') AS OrderNumber,
        JSON_VALUE(Doc, '$.CustomerName') AS Customer,
        Doc
 FROM
     OPENROWSET(
         BULK 'https://datalakebq5d8yi.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales/json/**',
         FORMAT = 'CSV',
         FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
         FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
         ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
     ) WITH (Doc NVARCHAR(MAX)) as rows
